documentation.xhtml: Implicitly generated code : DO NOT EDIT

ST.xhtml: LeapYear:= y MOD 400 = 0 OR y MOD 4 = 0 OR y MOD 100 <>0;
m:= LIMIT(1,m,12); QDay:= dpm[m] + BOOL_TO_UINT(m=2 AND LeapYear(y));

CASE Mode OF 1:swap_byte:=(ROR(IN,16)); // MEM.ReverseWORDsInDWORD 2:swap_byte := (ROR(IN,8) AND 16#00FF00FF) OR (ROL(IN,8) AND 16#FF00FF00); // AABB CCDD => BBAA DDCC 3:swap_byte := (ROR(IN,8) AND 16#FF00FF00) OR (ROL(IN,8) AND 16#00FF00FF); // AABB CCDD => DDCC BBAA MEM.ReverseBYTEsInDWORD END_CASE
pr:= ADR(IN); Dw_to_real:= pr^;
